attributes.action: Reverse the decision to seal shut specialist ovens that do not carry a Conformité Européenne mark in Chinese restaurants; prevent the interference of EU bureaucrats on a traditionally made oven which has had no reported health problems; and to heed the devastating impact this will have on the Chinese community and its culture, and on Chinese cuisine enthusiasts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An EU ban on ovens made in China means the much-loved Peking Duck and suckling pig (a staple of the London Chinese community) is now under threat. 

Please sign this petition to show your support.
